summary:
Add ticket (scroll) which can summon Dremora Merchant for once. Increase his gold to 10,000.
Mainly for those who chose "Secret Servant" in the Black Book in order to summon both butler and merchant.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This MOD add useful ticket (scroll) which can summon Dremora Merchant for once. Also increase his gold to 10,000. 
[/size][size=3]Made mainly for those who chose "Secret Servant" in the Black Book in order to summon both butler and merchant.

[/size][color=#fff2cc][size=3][b][u]How to Get [/u][/b][/size][/color][list]
[*][size=3]Three tickets and one letter are inside strong box placed behind Geldis Sadri in The Retching Netch.[/size]
[*][size=3]Dremora Merchant himself also sell more tickets.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[color=#00ffff][b]Required[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]DLC Dragonborn
[*]﻿Nice goods for trade with merchant

[*]Gold (as much)
[/list]
[/size][color=#ea9999][size=3][b][u]Compatibility
[/u][/b][/size][/color][size=3]Maybe imcomapatible with any MOD which change Dremora Merchant.
[/size][size=3]Because this mod tweek his inventory.
[/size][size=3]
Have a good trade :)[/size]
author: Pumpkin Pie
